reviews.text: Meat over tenderised just the way working class Hong Kongers like it. Very good attentive service.

Food is decent and price is reasonable, very typical HK style quick meal.

result.adr_address: 香港長沙灣元州街303號
result.name: 金滿都越南餐廳

reviews.text: 生牛肉湯河不錯，但凍檸茶飲品質素差些，建議飲可樂😛
地方比較簡單D，食品一般
環境尚算清靜，地方坐位可以舒適，招呼客人很好！餐牌食物相當好吃，越南三寶飯是很好味道，相當不錯。
在元州商場地下，有間安靜的越南菜 ，地方清潔整齊，員工服務態度良好，上菜速度好快， 食物味道甚佳 ，生牛肉粉很有牛味， 黑咖啡味道順口， 食物性價比甚高， 值得推薦。

result.adr_address: 20 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 20 Tai Chung Kiu Rd, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: Garden Rivera

reviews.text:
THE GOOD-------------------------------------
-Well connected Transport: Several buses take you to town center in just one stop, for the East Rail line and New Town Plaza Mall. Other buses available to take you to all four corners of Hong Kong.

-Very close to town center: 7-10 minutes walk on foot.

-Convenient: Numerous restaurants are near by.  711/snack shops/supermarket/dentist/beauticians/massage parlor/hardware store/TofuBucks/pharmacy/HKJC

-Great View/Location: Close to River for leisurely stroll after dinner. Apartments facing river side get a fantastic view of the town center and the adjacent Shing Mun River.

-Fiber optic Lines: Speedy internet access.

THE BAD-------------------------------------
-For such a price, whether you’re renting or buying, the apartment is notoriously small about 240 sq ft (net).

-Poor partitional wall layouts: makes it quite difficult to make efficient use of available space.

-These are 35 Y.O. Buildings. Many of the services often need to undergo maintenance and very frequently, at that. Flushing water is worst. Also leakage in the bathroom is major problem for many apartments. It could be water leaking from the bathroom into your living room/ bedroom, or leakage from the apartment above into your bathroom ceiling.

-The potable water may not be good for drinking: I personally drink bottled water, but switched to tap water for 2 weeks. My kidneys began to hurt. Then I went back to bottled water, the pain subsided. I did a test for impurities by evaporating many samples of water at different times during the year. The amount of residue is SHOCKING, this actually might be an issue that the Food and Environmental Hygiene Department (FEHD) needs to look into.

-If you are retired or will work from home, or will just spend most of the daytime hours at home, THE NOISE FROM RENOVATION WORKS ARE IMMENSELY LOUD AND FREQUENT. There is a very, very high tenant turnover rate at Garden Rivera and more likely than not. All six respective buildings will have one or several apartments undergoing renovation works at any one time. This reduces the Quality of Life of living here by a huge factor. NOT RECOMMENDED YOU MOVE HERE IF YOU ARE HOME FROM 9am-5pm.

-Retirees deploy portable speaker setups for karaoke across the river. These people notoriously pollute the serenity beside the river and the noise reaches Garden Rivera loud and clear. If you open your windows during the day, you will hear the ruckus in all its glory. The local council have received complaints on this issue, but have simply delegated the responsibility to the local police department. There are no police beats that incorporate the riverside and so the offenders remain unchecked and continue to destroy the peace and quiet.

-Being adjacent to two, three lane carriageways, the pollution in the air is immense. Not 2 days after cleaning your apartment, you will notice a layer of grey dust already setting in.
Local people live here nothing special
Taking walk along the river feels good.
Nice view over the river !  There are couples of buildings here. But we got used to name this whole area as "Garden Rivera 河畔花園".
Easy to go anywhere. And has bus stop to airport.

result.vicinity: 20 Tai Chung Kiu Road, Sha Tin

result.adr_address: 香港沙田大涌橋路20號
result.name: 河畔花園

reviews.text: 九唔搭八相片充斥，没欣賞價值！
單看城門河景已值回票價！
太 細..勝在叫有食市馬會

味道一般, 乳鴿太老,不是乳鴿是老鴿。 仲有個粉絲蝦煲， 唔新鮮，係冇味道，唔彈牙。 只有嘅 魚湯勝瓜浸蟶子鍋
比較好啲。🙂 只是一般菜式。
樓舊，地點偏
